variant.p: As proposed in the Exposure Draft, the Standard states that pronouncements of other standard‑setting bodies are used only if they do not conflict with:

li.p: the requirements and guidance in IFRSs dealing with similar and related issues; and
the definitions, recognition criteria and measurement concepts for assets, liabilities, income and expenses in the Framework.
